text:
Buy / visit this place at your own risk. Multi-story carpark is terrible - the narrowness of the ramp promises to give your car door an inevitable scratch. For interior, the layout of the house is just a sad imitation to a landed property. For the swimming pool, it looks more like a sad-looking pond.

Suggest potential buyers to look for other better buys.

Seems like all visitors don’t wind down their window to tell the Security staffs of their destination! Hence the cars behind jammed up . Kindly put up a notice near the Car park staff’s counter to advice the drivers to wind down their windows to expedite smooth traffic.

Very safe environment with professional Security agency by the name of association Securite. And management services. As my living here the management has comply me such a living and security guard very firm and friendly. Keeping the estate safe 24hr.
There seems to be the smell of eggs around block 2. Some fish also appear dead in the pond. Despite those factors, condo is great with an amazing community.
The worlds worst multi story car park. Go in at your own risk. If you’re driving a big car be prepared to scratch it. Horrible omg!!!!
